Replace.Text: Let me be your personal musician. Let me Explore your mind. How ingenious are your ideas, and how terrifying is your rising will? When your music reaches its climax, I will naturally be completely fascinated by you; At that time, I will play myself for you.
See what you see, see what I see.

Whether it was learning archery from her father or combat skills in the monastery, Archetto would always hold herself to a high standard to hunt more animals and uphold the monastery's reputation. When she left the monastery and saw just how vast the land truly was, Archetto realized how much more significance her arrows could carry.
My bow has three choices, and the enemy three hardships.

Fiammetta, senior special correspondent of the Laterano Notarial Hall. Works with Mostima, and claims to be Mostima's overseer and that she is in charge of making sure Mostima does not leak any critical confidential information about Laterano as she liaises with the outside world.
There's no fluking between success and failure.

Executor, an official professional executor of Laterano Notarial Hall, has the rights and interests of Laterano citizens from Point 1 to 13 and granted the title of "Saint" by His Holiness the Pope Yvangelista XI of Laterano.
The broken taboo no longer holds power.
The current Pope is aware of the truth behind the Lateran 'Law' and knows that the grace of the 'Law' cannot be spread to the Terra, but still promotes cooperation among nations.
We are facing challenges, not in Lateran, but in every country of Terra.
You can add more Beliefs into your religion.
You can add {1_Amount: number #} {1_Amount : plural 1?Belief; other?Beliefs;} into your religion
{LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_LATERAN_DECLARATION_NAME}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Recruit past great persons owned by others.
This Great People once belongs to
No Great Person can be recruited yet
The Great Person {1_IndividualName}, who once belonged to you, has been recruited again by someone. You're paid {2_Amount} [ICON_FAITH] Faith as reward.

Can only declare Holy War.[NEWLINE]Capital city adjust +3 [ICON_GREATPROPHET] Great Prophet Points and +3 [ICON_FAITH] Faith.[NEWLINE]Upon founding Religion, you can instantly adopts all Beliefs. You can adopt 1 more Belief for each Revelation Tower you have (Up to 6 extra Beliefs).

When you activate a [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person they spread 600 Religious pressure of your founded (or majority) religion to cities within 10 tiles.[NEWLINE]For city follow your religion, its building will provide more [ICON_GREATPERSON] Great Person Points: Great Artist for Holy Site buildings, Great Scientist for Campus and Great Musician for Theater. And for these buildings, they will provide +1 yield to all same buildings.

Grant +1 [icon_movement] Movement towards Recon and Ranged units. May unlock series of projects after building some infrustructures and unlock some Techs or Civics:[NEWLINE]Pious Fundraising: Holy Site and Civic Foreign Trade.[NEWLINE]Seeds of Tomorrow: Farm and Tech Irrigation.[NEWLINE]Landen Tactics: Encampment and Tech Military Tactics.[NEWLINE]Yesterday Once More: Theater and Civic Natural History.

Grant +1 [icon_governor] Governor Title for each Revelation Tower you built.[NEWLINE]Each [ICON_ENVOY] Envoy you send to a city-state of your majority Religion counts as two [ICON_ENVOY] Envoys. Grant +20% corresponding yield towards district buildings for each tributary city-state.(Can stack 3 times).[NEWLINE]May assign a unique Governor "Fallen Angel".

Allowed to declare Formal War despite Civilization Traits. Grant +1 [icon_movement] Movement and +5 [icon_strength] Combat Strength if at war with any Major Civ.[NEWLINE]Every Citizen exerts +0.5 loyalty pressure and yield +0.5 [icon_culture] Culture and +0.5 [icon_faith] Faith. Doubled if you're not that city's founder.[NEWLINE]Land victory will spread your religion to nearby cities.

If not war with any Major Civ: +30% [icon_faith] Faith, +15% [ICON_GREATPERSON] Great Person Points, +100% Religious Pressure and Spread Distance.[NEWLINE]May recruit past [icon_greatperson] Great Perosons that once owned by others.[NEWLINE]Your districts grant +2 corresponding yield for every [icon_greatperson] Great Person you recruited.
Lateran unique Building replaces Monument. Grant +1 [icon_faith] Faith and +1 [icon_culture] Culture for each Belief adopted in city's Major Religion. Provide +8 Loyalty per turn.

Lateran unique District replaces Holy Site that costs less. Has a base adjacency of +4 [icon_faith] Faith.[NEWLINE]For district itself and every building in it, provide +1 [icon_food] Food and [icon_faith] Faith towards city's Bonus Resources, +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards Strategic one, +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_GOLD] Gold towards Luxury one.
Lateran unique Unit with exclusive promotions. Can't be trained and grant one for each Holy Site built.[NEWLINE]With the development of Player Tech/Civic eras, grant promotions and strengthen up.
When defeating an enemy, gain [icon_faith] Faith equal to 100% that unit's base strength.
Ignore ZOC. When defeating an non-barbarian enemy, auto spread your religion to nearby cities.
Receive +1 [icon_movement] Movement. Ignore the movement penalty of Terrains and Rivers.
Receive +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength when combating heathens.
Ignore the penalty of combating a district's defense.
Receive +3 Trade Route capacity. Holy Site will yield [icon_gold] Gold equivalent to [icon_faith] Faith
Farms and Plantations receive +1 [icon_food] Food, and will provide a standard adjacency to Holy Site.
Ranged Units and Pontifica Cohors Lateran receive +1 [ICON_RANGED] Attacking Range, and are able to move after attack.
All Districts grant +4 [icon_culture] Culture, and if adjacent to Holy Site or Theater, provide additional +3 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism
Your messenger, {1_Name}, heared from Mostima that

Mostima's enemies feel a sense of sluggishness while facing her, as if the tempo of their own time has been lowered, but we've never heard of an Originium Arts capable of interfering with time, and have never been able to find the secret within. This ability and her identity are just as full of enigma.Regardless, as a Caster, her worth doesn't stop there. Give her the ultimate stage, and give her a little time to prepare. When she pulls the other staff out, no matter how great her enemies are, they'll be dust on the wind.
Can be assigned to other civilizations' city. If assigned to a city-state, acts as 2 [ICON_Envoy] Envoys.
If assigned to a city-state, doubles [ICON_Envoy] Envoys you send to.
If assigned to a city-state, grant its Luxury and Strategic Resources. You can levy city-states for 30% cheaper cost.
If assigned to other Major's city, reduce this city's yield by 30%
Doubles {LOC_GOVERNOR_PROMOTION_OPH_MOSTIMA_R1_NAME}'s effect. If assigned to other Major's city, reduce units' movement by 1 within 6 tiles.
Reveal the whole world. Increase your diplomatic visibility by 1.
Devoted to vigorously developing religion and culture, and fond of civilizations that do the same.
Focus on promoting one's own religion, enjoy accepting the civilization of one's own religion, and be hostile towards non believers.
We will focus on developing the infrastructure of each city and be willing to engage in trade with other civilizations.
Committed to extensive communication with every civilization and expanding its influence. Hate competing with the civilization of the city-state.
Devote oneself to world peace and common development, recruit talented individuals, and enjoy civilizations that do the same.
